role: Establish foundational partnerships across insurance, restoration, smart-home, and data partners.
goals: Map and prioritize partner categories for the ecosystem.
Launch initial pilots and agreements with 3–5 anchor partners.
Prepare API, white-label, and data-sharing concepts for Phase 4.
tasks: Identify and categorize potential partners (carriers, adjusters, restoration, IoT, marketplaces).
Draft initial one-pagers and pitch materials tailored to each partner category.
Collaborate with technical teams on a first-cut public API and white-label concept.
Support legal/compliance in drafting early data-sharing templates.
deliverables: Short domain-specific strategy/roadmap doc for this phase.
Updated documentation for this role’s systems and workflows.
One or more implemented improvements aligned with the phase goals.
Partner pipeline overview and status by category.
success_metrics: Clear before/after improvement in reliability, clarity, or value in this domain.
Stakeholders understand and can use the new workflows or capabilities.
This role’s area is ready for the next phase’s increased scope and complexity.
Meaningful increase in partner-sourced value (traffic, data, or revenue).
